TopicTitle: How long has your save game been running?

Articles.Content:
In Kerbal time, how many years and days has your current/main/favourite/longest/whatever save file been running?

My "New Beginnings" save file, started after the release of .20, is on Year 6, Day 355. I just realized that means poor Patlo Kerman has been roasting while out doing EVA on Moho for about 4 years. Oops.

Not very long. My .18 save file got killed by .20

So my current save... I haven't been doing much with. I've made the beginnings of a space station that I plan to train my Kerbals on and use as a refueling station. So basically I'm waiting for .21...
I spend most of my time in the VAB and on the pad, and when I go back to the VAB, time stops again.. But I'm now somewhere near the end of year 3 because I just did 2 missions to Laythe.
Not too long. I spent 43 days on a transfer to Duna. And that was on like... Day 8? So roughly 55 days.

Just started up a new save to celebrate my new Flag/Company/Concept. So, I'm uh... 3 hours into a Kerbin re-Kethane-mapping project. :/ On the plus side, the new mapping probe went up perfectly on the first try, into a sweet polar orbit with 100% solar coverage. In the morning (real), we'll see about getting a transfer vehicle up there that can boost it to either the Mun or Minmus. That should be about 4 days in. ...make that 20 days, I forgot was running on 50x, this time.

Year 3, day 97, about one year used in waiting and doing some transfers to Jool and Eeloo.

(And it's my original save file from my beginnings in the game after getting paid version, 0.19.1, took me 3 weeks to make the switch 0.20 because of all the broken mod parts.)
I've had the same save since v.18 and it's up to year 21, day 85 now.
My save file I started at the release of .20 has been going on for 1 year 4 days.
Ya I dropped My .17 Save when .20 came out.. Started a whole new series though.. So Im happy.
About 4 years. Lost all my ships in the 0.19-0.20 update, but kept the kerbals.

I've had the same save since v.18 and it's up to year 21, day 85 now.

Wow, that is impressive!
I have a save from 0.18, although I have multiple saves so the game doesn't lag as much with several flights in progress.
Year 3x something something.. All I know is I have yet to reach year 40.

Fourteen days. Which is probably, like, ten days longer than any others I've had.

That number will probably start going up once I finally start doing interplanetary missions.

(Despite playing since single-digit releases, I'm way behind, as the sig shows. Too much waiting for certain things to become stock, and then not having time to run missions once they are.)
My game is reaching the end of it's second in-game Kerbal year.

I've managed to keep my save going back to 0.17 (I think). Lost a few craft due to updates but most survived (I did have to surgically remove the old KAS mod from a couple). My space program is now 25 years, 17 days old and has 67 "flights" in progress (a lot of those are satellites and landed probes).

When 0.19 came out I created a new world, same for 0.20, so my game has only been running for ~70 days.

I'm more of a designer guy. I spend lots of time in the VAB, in which the time doesn't run. I'm not proud of a station or base, I'm proud of my Constellation System replica:

-Ares V (With Altair or a cargo version)

-Ares V (SRB only first stage, just like the real thing!)

-Autmated Altair Lander stage (Lands cargo at the Mun Base)
I start a new save with every major release, as there's usually enough feature changes to warrant remaking most of my spacecraft.

Year 3x something something.. All I know is I have yet to reach year 40.

That's pretty incredible. Lots of long interplanetary missions?
Year 33, Day 214. The save has been around since 0.18, so...
My .21 save has been around for 6 years 3 days 18 hours and 25 minutes. My station (The first thing I launched in .21) has a MET of 1024 days!

My .21 save has been around for 6 years 3 days 18 hours and 25 minutes. My station (The first thing I launched in .21) has a MET of 1024 days!

0.21???

My current save has been around since about 2 weeks before .20 came out (so .19). I deleted the last one.

Edited June 30, 2013 by RocketPilot573
My 0.18 save has been going for at least 6 years. Converting to 0.20 was a hassle.

Mine doesn't count any longer... It's stuck at year "-67, Day -34--3H, -14m.

I've left Bill, Bob & Jeb landed on Duna for the past 20 years or so to make sure I can't kill them, lol.

Mine doesn't count any longer... It's stuck at year "-67, Day -34--3H, -14m.

I've left Bill, Bob & Jeb landed on Duna for the past 20 years or so to make sure I can't kill them, lol.

No wonder it cant count anymore, the game saves that value in seconds.:0.0::confused:

EDIT: Just calculated it, so I guess the game stopped at 2,115,861,240.

Edited June 30, 2013 by RocketPilot573
